alert.note: Alert for Grant; Morton; Stanton; Stevens (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 11:07PM CDT until May 16 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Morton County in southwestern Kansas... Grant County in southwestern Kansas... Southern Stanton County in southwestern Kansas... Stevens County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1105 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles east of Richfield, moving east at 35 mph. This replaces the previous warning for Stanton and Morton counties. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Moscow and Cave. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
